definition: a fortified, protected building, usually with a wall around it, owned by a prince or noble esp. in former times
a small, furry, carnivorous animal often kept as a pet
to look at so as to understand the meaning of (something written, printed, etc.):
a work printed on sheets of paper bound together within covers
a common four-legged animal kept as a pet and bred in many varieties
a soft candy usually made with sugar, butter, milk, and flavoring
(used to introduce a question) for what cause or reason or purpose?
a liquid food, such as gravy, put on food:
